actions.committee: Committee on Labor and Human Resources
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Labor and Human Resources.

actions.in_committee: Committee on Labor and Human Resources
actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Employment and Productivity.

official_title: A bill to amend the Stewart B. McKinney Homeless Assistance Act to extend the Job Training for the Homeless Demonstration Program, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Amends the Stewart B. McKinney Homeless Assistance Act to authorize FY 1991 appropriations for the job training for the homeless program. Obligates specified amounts for homeless veterans' reintegration projects. Extends such programs through FY 1992. Extends the deadline for the Secretary of Labor's evaluation of such programs.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Stewart B. McKinney Homeless Assistance Act to extend the Job Training for the Homeless Demonstration Program, and for other purposes.
